description: Aspose.Cells for .NET is a spreadsheet programming component that allows software developers to manipulate and convert spreadsheet files from within their own applications. A combination of APIs and GUI controls, Aspose.Cells for .NET speeds up Microsoft Excel programming and conversion.
releaseNotes:
New Features
(CELLSNET-45614)- Determine Which Stack Size is needed for a certain Workbook 
(CELLSNET-45649)- Format the Custom Label Font and its Cell with smart marker.
(CELLSNET-44353)- Support to control loading of external resources in Excel Workbook 
(CELLSNET-40787)- Lose Track Changes after conversion (XLS --> XLSM) 
(CELLSNET-45607)- Show Cell Comment as Excel Tooltip 
Enhancements
(CELLSNET-45559)- Share Price Series Label is not Positioning Properly 
(CELLSNET-45626)- Exception: "Too many entries. Consider setting ZipOutputStream.Enable Zip64" on merging the file(s) 
(CELLSNET-45622)- Why setFitToPagesWide 1 needs to set setFitToPagesTall 0 for - Fit All Columns on One Page 
(CELLSNET-45576)- When RecommendReadOnly is true, IsWriteProtected is also true 
(CELLSNET-45581)- Grid Desktop should not scroll past Last Column 
(CELLSNET-45577)- Grid Desktop should not scroll past Last Row 
Performance
(CELLSNET-45633)- GetRanges performance issue when using customfunction with lots of functions to be calculated 
Bugs
(CELLSNET-45592)- Some drawing elements' position is wrong  in Excel to PDF rendering 
(CELLSNET-45575)- Grey background on the box is missing in output Pdf 
(CELLSNET-45516)- Shape text dispersed/scattered in Excel to PDF rendering 
(CELLSNET-45415)- Sheet to Image rendering ignores Asian fonts in TextBox with cell reference 
(CELLSNET-45315)- Some text (labels) missing of the shape in Sheet to Image rendering 
(CELLSNET-45655)- Providing one option to control whether keeping number precision format 
(CELLSNET-45630)- HTML output of 222.xlsx is not right 
(CELLSNET-45621)- Two image resources created instead of one when saving as HTML 
(CELLSNET-45597)- "Number stored as Text" for the numeric columns 
(CELLSNET-45558)- When MHtml file is saved with XLS extension, MS Excel shows errors when opening the XLS file
(CELLSNET-45557)- Formatting lost after saving the file as XLS 
(CELLSNET-45556)- Images lost after saving the file as XLS 
(CELLSNET-45538)- Images lost and formattings are removed when saving an MHtml file to XLS or MHT 
(CELLSNET-45584)- Infinite loop when use PageSetup.GetCommands() 
(CELLSNET-45637)- Three hyphens "---" are rendered as empty space in the output PDF 
(CELLSNET-45612)- Issue with floating lines (single, double underlines) in Excel to PDF conversion 
(CELLSNET-45608)- When ImageOrPrintOptions.OnlyArea = true, the data gets corrupted 
(CELLSNET-45605)- Partially missing characters when converting to image 
(CELLSNET-45571)- Default grey cell borders converted into dotted lines 
(CELLSNET-45628)- The word is renamed when converting to image 
(CELLSNET-45603)- Issue with Chart.Calculate() method 
(CELLSNET-45602)- Issue with trend equations in the chart 
(CELLSNET-45587)- Scale is increased in the output PDF for the Radar chart 
(CELLSNET-45573)- Chart image is not having three-digit numbers 
(CELLSNET-45569)- Unable to render image from chart via Aspose.Cells 
(CELLSNET-45563)- Incorrect Chart PDF when line plotting is compared to source Excel 
(CELLSNET-45561)- Image generated from Sample.xlsm worksheet SampleCharts is not correct 
(CELLSNET-45441)- Chart legend is rendered in wrong position when converted to image 
(CELLSNET-45643)- OLE object changes size after opening and editing OLE object file 
(CELLSNET-45639)- SpreadsheetML - Hidden attribute on column does not work
(CELLSNET-45638)- Inserting column in worksheet causes the corrupt output Excel file 
(CELLSNET-45636)- SpreadsheetML - Hidden attribute on Row is not working properly 
(CELLSNET-45624)- Saving a custom date property results in wrong time written 
(CELLSNET-45617)- Column width is changed after loading and saving a xls file 
(CELLSNET-45616)- Circle Graph and Column Graph are changed dramatically after re-load and re-save 
(CELLSNET-45613)- Workbook.RemoveUnusedStyles does not work as expected on Table styles 
(CELLSNET-45598)- Smart Marker: Multiple groups with skip overlaps grand total row 
(CELLSNET-45588)- Excel has to repair the Macro file - Removed Part: /xl/vbaProject.bin part 
(CELLSNET-45623)- Cannot edit merged cells when setting focus by mouse click - Aspose.Cells.GridDesktop 
(CELLSNET-45565)- Issue using grouped rows/cols in GridWeb 
(CELLSNET-45537)- Image Icon is lost after editing the cell B3 
(CELLSNET-45448)- Group Columns do not work in GridWeb 
Exceptions
(CELLSNET-45627)- PivotTable.CalculateData() method throws System.IndexOutOfRangeException 
(CELLSNET-45610)- NullReferenceException when reading XLSX using LoadFilter containing Pivot Table 
(CELLSNET-42702)- "Unreadable Content" error on creating the pivot table 
(CELLSNET-45635)- Input string was not in a correct format - Exception on opening Excel file 
(CELLSNET-45589)- Item has already been added. Key in dictionary: 'Sheet1'  Key being added: 'Sheet1' 
(CELLSNET-45647)- Exception occurs on opening the BUDGET RH 3_1.xlsm in GridWeb 
(CELLSNET-45646)- Exception when importing XLSM files into GridWeb
summary: Aspose.Cells for .Net is a class library for Excel document processing
title: Aspose.Cells for .NET
